description: Great / Large studio apartment over looking a courtyard. Perfect location, 2 blocks from the N/Q train.  Lots of good food and drink options near by. 10 minutes to Manhattan, 20 minutes to Union Square. In the heart of vibrant Astoria Queens.
name: Private Large studio in Astoria
review: Michael is a great host. Spacious studio apartment, clean, quiet, comfortable. Excellent location.
